content: मर्दन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [मृद्-ल्यु ल्युट् वा] {@--1@} Crushing, grinding, destroying, tormenting, rubbing, &c. --नं Crushing, grinding. {@--2@} Rubbing, shampooing. {@--3@} Anointing (with unguents &c.). {@--4@} Pressing, kneading. {@--5@} Paining, tormenting, afflicting. {@--6@} Destroying. {@--7@} Devastating, laying waste. {@--8@} Opposition of planets. {@--9@} Breaking up (as of ice &c.).
